member.name: CreatePackageDependencyOptions
member.summary: Defines options that can be applied when creating a package dependency by using the function.

member.name: CreatePackageDependencyOptions.CreatePackageDependencyOptions_DoNotVerifyDependencyResolution
member.summary: Disables dependency resolution when pinning a package dependency. This is useful for installers running as user contexts other than the target user (for example, installers running as LocalSystem).

member.name: CreatePackageDependencyOptions.CreatePackageDependencyOptions_ScopeIsSystem
member.summary: Defines the package dependency for the system, accessible to all users (by default, the package dependency is defined for a specific user). This option requires the caller has administrative privileges.
